name: Life Dream
description:
Life Dream is a Videogame Experiment about the world of drugs.

We developed the game as nothing more than a technical experience to improve our developing ability and we started developing after a look to LSD:Dream Emulator for PSX that is our main game model.

In the game there are 2 tipes of drugs:

-LSD

-Marijuana

Each drug has about 4/5 game scenes,all different and magically non-sense.

The objective is for the player to go on with the scenes and to try all the different ways to explore the scene and find secrets and easter-eggs.

We tried to give the player a totally strange and new experience with those types of games:something like it's not a game,but an artwork.

We're developing the second episode of this game so stay connected to know more about it!

It's all.

Get your time to try it and discover a lisergic world behind some fresh non-sense.

And remember: drug is bad.

Life Dream,2013

Developed by Crilose.
